amendment.description: To establish a deficit-neutral reserve fund relating to preventing electricity blackouts and improving electricity reliability.

vote.text: Amendment SA 3243 agreed to in Senate by Yea-Nay Vote. 52 - 47. Record Vote Number: 346.

action.text: Amendment SA 3243 proposed by Senator Hoeven. (consideration: CR S6229-6230; text: CR S6229) To establish a deficit-neutral reserve fund relating to preventing electricity blackouts and improving electricity reliability.
Senate amendment proposed (on the floor): Amendment SA 3243 proposed by Senator Hoeven.
